QuantEcon

Open source code for economic modeling

  • Home
  • About
  • News
  • Contribute
  • Projects
  • Team

QuantEcon is a NumFOCUS fiscally sponsored project dedicated to development and documentation of modern open source computational tools for economics, econometrics, and decision making. We welcome contributions and collaboration from the economics community and other partner organizations.

Projects

  • Lectures in Quantitative Economics

    A sequence of lectures on quantitative economic modeling

  • QuantEcon.py

    A high performance, open source Python code library for economics

  • QuantEcon.jl

    A high performance, open source Julia code library for economics

  • Notebooks

    Browse, preview and download QuantEcon notebooks

  • QE Notes

    An open Jupyter notebook library for economics and finance

  • Cheatsheets

    Scientific programming cheatsheets for Python and Julia

  • Workshops and Seminars

    Previous and forthcoming workshops and seminars with accompanying resources

  • QuantEcon DataScience

    Introduction to Economic Modeling and Data Science

  • Jupinx

    Jupinx is an open source tool for converting ReStructuredText source files into a website via Jupyter Notebooks
